Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Northbound Reroute near King Drive/69th
ShortDescription: Northbound #3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, 69th, Anthony and King Drive: due to, street blockage near King Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Northbound #3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, 69th, Anthony, King Drive and over regular route, due to street blockage near King Drive/69th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #72 North Temporary Westbound Reroute near North Avenue/Sedgwick
